name: Key-Tana
description:
This game is difficult, but no part of it is impossible

Key-Tana : A Community Game Jam submission (Made in 1 week)

Theme : The Game is a Liar

Controls 

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Slash

Keyboard Keys - You will see soon enough

Gameplay

Its your regular 2D action platformer, slice enemies, deflect bullets and lasers to get score. Do it fast to accumulate combo and you will get even more score.

But there is a twist. Tutorial checkpoints (the red barriers) made it into the actual game, forcing you to press a key (which doesn't do what it says it will) before allowing you to move again. So think smart and don't rush into it. 

Tips

Many people complain about the red barriers so here is some tips. You don't have to pass the barrier then attack the enemies behind it, you can instead bait the Sword Enemy to pass the barrier (By moving near it then backing away) and for the Pistol enemies you can deflect their bullets. For the Drone enemies, the bullets are harder to deflect but they take a long time to shoot, so in this case you would pass the red barrier first then attack it ASAP.

How to Install

1. Download the Zip file provided 

2. Extract the Zip file (Make sure to extract to a new folder)

3. Open the file and launch Key-Tana.exe

4. A configuration prompt will show up, choose your desired resolution, windowed mode is preferred. Do not mess with the input settings.

5. Click Play, Have fun!
